tech_news.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.

tech_news.title: Wyze’s new security camera watches your yard from inside your home - The Verge
tech_news.description: Wyze’s new $35 Window Cam that sticks to a window inside your house so it can monitor what’s going on outside is cheaper and simpler than an exterior camera.
